title: New Morg skin idea
body:
I was thinking that Morgana should get a skin portraying what she looked like before she fell/ when she was still an angel.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
She has one... Its called exiled Morganna....

Downvote for being uneducated...

BEFORE she fell, not after. The skin would show her being angelic and graceful, with wings like Kayle. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

> [{quoted}](name=StrangelyCrabble,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=iZoWZgyn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-08-27T05:01:28.817+0000)
>
> BEFORE she fell, not after. The skin would show her being angelic and graceful, with wings like Kayle. 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

IT IS BEFORE.... IT AS SHE IS EXILED.... WHICH IS WHEN SHE IS STILL TECHNICALLY ANGELIC YOU UNEDUCATED PLEB
